name: Kitten Condo Town
description:
Build your own Kitten condo and populate them with with a unique puzzle.

Start with a small kitten. Then combine, mix and match your kittens to upgrade them to majestic cats.
Each kitten can be merged with other kitten of the same variety to form a bigger kitten.

Game features:
-Simple, intuitive and easy to use controls
-Easy, addictive and very challenging
-Fun to play and the best time pass as a leisure activity
-Simple, intuitive and instinctive graphics and gameplay
-Money , levels and Time to get you going

Collect profits and cash from your kitten even and buy more kitten from the shop. Complete challenging tasks, gain rewards and achievements. There is also a prestige feature to gain powerful bonuses.

Discover and unlock many types of cats. Complete achievements and gain rewards. Watch your condo grow to a big tower which is filled with toys all over.

Become a master kitten collector. What are you waiting. Down load now!
